dialogue.htmlContent:
Feeling a little hungry, you decide to make use of this dining hall and get something to eat. #IF(pc.isTaur()) Having had taur-compatible chairs placed around the long, wooden table in the centre of the room, you [pc.step] over to one of them and sit down. #ELSE [pc.Stepping] around to the head of the long, wooden table in the centre of the room, you allow [npc.name] to dutifully pull the chair out for you, before taking a seat. #ENDIF

Knowing that there are enough ingredients in the kitchen for your slaves to make anything you desire, you wonder what to order...

Calling [npc.name] over to your side, you tell [npc.herHim] that [npc.she]'ll be acting as your #IF(npc.isFeminine()) waitress, #ELSE waiter, #ENDIF before informing [npc.herHim] of what you want to eat. #IF(npc.getObedienceBasic()==OBEDIENCE_BASIC_DISOBEDIENT && npc.getAffectionLevelBasic(pc)==AFFECTION_BASIC_DISLIKE) Although [npc.she] insolently tells you how much [npc.she] hates doing this sort of work, [npc.she] has no choice but to take your order. Scowling at you as [npc.she] departs, #IF(npc.isSlave())your slave#ELSE[npc.name]#ENDIF hurries off to the kitchen to relay your choice to the chef. #ELSE After taking your order, #IF(npc.isSlave())your slave#ELSE[npc.name]#ENDIF hurries off to the kitchen to relay your choice to the chef. #ENDIF

Although your meal is freshly prepared for you, the top-of-the-range arcane ovens which are installed in the kitchen allow your selected dish to be ready within ten minutes. Bringing you your food on a silver platter, [npc.name] places it before you, and then after pouring you a drink [npc.she] [npc.steps] back and waits while you tuck in.

Soon enough you've finished every last bite, and as [npc.name] clears the dishes away, you wonder whether to order some 'dessert' from [npc.herHim]...

Starting to feel a different sort of hunger, you reach across to give [npc.namePos] groin a grope as [npc.she] leans forwards to pick up your plate. Smirking as you feel [npc.her] shaft twitch in response to your touch, you tell #IF(npc.isSlave())your slave#ELSE[npc.name]#ENDIF to go to the kitchen and have the chef turn [npc.her] cock into a dessert for you to enjoy.

Doing as [npc.sheIs] told, [npc.name] picks up your plate and hurries away to the kitchen. A short while later [npc.she] returns, and you lick your [pc.lips] in anticipation as you see that [npc.her] cock is covered in whipped cream, [style.random(chocolate|caramel|strawberry)] sauce, and [style.random(sprinkles|has a cherry perched on top)].

#IF(npc.isTaur()) [npc.Stepping] over to stand beside you, [npc.name] lifts [npc.her] hind leg so as to present you with [npc.her] cream-covered cock. #ELSE Sitting down on the table before you, [npc.name] spreads [npc.her] [npc.legs+] and presents you with [npc.her] cream-covered cock. #ENDIF Unable to resist, you slowly lick the sweet, sugary coating off of [npc.her] hard shaft. Soon enough, you're wrapping your [pc.lips+] around [npc.her] [npc.cock+] and [pc.moaning] in delight as you give [npc.herHim] a blowjob...

Starting to feel a different sort of hunger, you reach across to give [npc.namePos] groin a grope as [npc.she] leans forwards to pick up your plate. Smirking as [npc.she] lets out a surprised gasp, you tell #IF(npc.isSlave())your slave#ELSE[npc.name]#ENDIF to go to the kitchen and have the chef turn [npc.her] pussy into a dessert for you to enjoy.

Doing as [npc.sheIs] told, [npc.name] picks up your plate and hurries away to the kitchen. A short while later [npc.she] returns, and you lick your [pc.lips] in anticipation as you see that [npc.her] [npc.pussy] is covered in whipped cream, [style.random(chocolate|caramel|strawberry)] sauce, and [style.random(sprinkles|has a cherry perched on top)].

#IF(npc.isTaur()) [npc.Stepping] over to stand in front of you, [npc.name] turns around and backs up so as to present you with [npc.her] cream-covered cunt. #ELSE Sitting down on the table before you, [npc.name] spreads [npc.her] [npc.legs+] and presents you with [npc.her] cream-covered cunt. #ENDIF Unable to resist, you slowly lick the sweet, sugary coating off of [npc.her] [npc.labia+]. Soon enough, you're pressing your [pc.lips+] against [npc.her] [npc.pussy+] and [pc.moaning] in delight as you eat [npc.herHim] out...

Starting to feel a different sort of hunger, you reach across to give [npc.namePos] ass a slap as [npc.she] leans forwards to pick up your plate. Smirking as [npc.she] lets out a surprised gasp, you tell #IF(npc.isSlave())your slave#ELSE[npc.name]#ENDIF to go to the kitchen and have the chef turn [npc.her] butt into a dessert for you to enjoy.

Doing as [npc.sheIs] told, [npc.name] picks up your plate and hurries away to the kitchen. A short while later [npc.she] returns, and you lick your [pc.lips] in anticipation as you see that [npc.her] rear end is covered in whipped cream, [style.random(chocolate|caramel|strawberry)] sauce, and [style.random(sprinkles|has a cherry perched on top)].

Soon enough, you're pressing your [pc.lips+] against [npc.her] [npc.asshole+] and [pc.moaning] in delight as you perform anilingus on [npc.herHim]...
Having enjoyed your dessert, you stand up and get your things back in order. As [npc.name] returns to [npc.her] place at the edge of the room, you look around and wonder what to do next...
